Text: Hey guys..I´m so sorry I haven´t posted a new episode yet..I have problems with my source...my episodes are not in sync...! Not sure what happend..hope the channel I get my episodes from can fix the problem soon...!! I won´t be able to get the missing episodes without the problems so I will be back with the episodes when the problem is fixed...So Sorry..!

no problem!
we are thankful for everything you are doing for us! :-)

is the sync problem variable or static? if its staticly maybe it can be fixed with VirtualDub but it may require more work than its worth.
the current show is working again.. I tried it almost 2 hours with VirtualDub to fix it...and it didn´t work...and then I gave up...so I hope now it will stay Ok...
